title: DREAM SEAFORT / NO DOLORES DREAM
description: This is the consolation dream if you did not get to see stained glass window inside church

dialogueTree.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Sleep is merciful this time, brothe..."
dialogueTree.text: Sleep is merciful this time, brother. Not too deep. Lit by the continuous sound of the sea outside.

links.title: Limbic System: "And the shape of the insect, its cy..."
links.text: And the shape of the insect, its cyclical praying motion just... going on and on. That thing. Looking at you. You -- two things standing in front of each other...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "No. Relax, man. It's just the comfo..."
links.text: No. Relax, man. It's just the comfortable darkness. Interrupted by the pain in your body. A telegraph, far away.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Far enough not to hurt for a while."
links.text: Far enough not to hurt for a while.

links.title: Volition: "And your mind healing too. Weaving..."
links.text: And your mind healing too. Weaving itself back into shape.

links.title: Logic: "You did it... you solved the case."
links.text: You did it... you solved the case.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Somehow you managed to dodge it all..."
links.text: Somehow you managed to dodge it all... The church, the window *and* the bad book in the store. On the shelf. You made it. Across the black sea unharmed...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Nothing. Just threats that passed b..."
links.text: Nothing. Just threats that passed by -- outside in the world. Ill omens from another life. Not this one. You ignored them. Good. The sleep is nourishing. Take more of it.

links.title: Limbic System: "You do so many times. Until dim lig..."
links.text: You do so many times. Until dim light starts peeking into the hood you're under. The rough karakul. More and more each second. Time to face it again -- the world. Anew...

links.title: Limbic System: "And a little something in there......"
links.text: And a little something in there... a sensation. The bow drawn across a string. Something small and crustacean-like.
